import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { clearItemFromCart } from '../../redux/cart/cart.actions' import './checkout-item.styles.scss' const CheckoutItem = ({ cartItem: { name, imageUrl, quantity, price } }) => { return
{name} {quantity} {price}
✕
} const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => ({ clearItem: item => dispatch(clearItemFromCart(item)) }) export default connect(mapDispatchToProps)(CheckoutItem)
